summary: This document is an email chain from May 24, 2021, in which attorney Jason Foy forwards a threatening email received by his partner, James Seplowitz, to a government contact (Eric Sarraga). Foy interprets the email as a threat against his safety, believes it is related to his client, and requests a government investigation into its credibility.

persons.name: Jason Foy
persons.context: Attorney at Foy & Seplowitz LLC who forwards a threatening email to a government contact, interpreting it as a threat against his safety related to his client.

persons.name: James Seplowitz
persons.context: Partner of Jason Foy who received the initial threatening email, which was then forwarded to Jason Foy and a government contact.

persons.name: Eric Sarraga
persons.context: Government recipient (likely from USAO NYS) copied on the email chain, to whom Jason Foy requests an investigation into the perceived threat.

persons.name: Vegas Army Vet
persons.context: Sender of the initial threatening email to James Seplowitz, with the message 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!'

connections.description: Partners at the law firm Foy & Seplowitz LLC, as indicated by the email signature and reference to 'my partner'.
Foy is communicating with Sarraga, a government contact, to request an investigation into a perceived threat.
Seplowitz received a threatening email from 'Vegas Army Vet' with the message 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!'
Foy interprets the email sent to his partner as a threat against his own safety, likely related to his client.

events.title: Threatening Email Received
events.description: Attorney James Seplowitz receives an email from 'Vegas Army Vet' with the threatening message 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!'

events.title: Request for Government Investigation
events.description: Attorney Jason Foy forwards the threatening email to government contact Eric Sarraga, requesting an expedited investigation into its credibility as a perceived threat against his safety.

keyFacts: Attorney Jason Foy received a forwarded threatening email sent to his partner, James Seplowitz, from 'Vegas Army Vet' on May 24, 2021.
The threatening email stated: 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!' which Foy interpreted as a direct threat against his safety.
Foy requested that the government (contact Eric Sarraga) investigate the threat's credibility, indicating concern over client-related intimidation.
The email suggests ongoing legal or personal tensions related to Foy's client, prompting a formal request for protective investigation.
